S3Config.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that is used to access an Amazon S3 bucket.

BucketAccessRoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role of the Amazon S3 bucket.
BucketAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the IAM role of the Amazon S3 bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

S3Config.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that is used to access an Amazon S3 bucket.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

S3BucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket.
S3BucketArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 156  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):s3:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]*:.*$  
Update requires: Replacement

Subdirectory.description: A subdirectory in the Amazon S3 bucket. This subdirectory in Amazon S3 is used to read data from the S3 source location or write data to the S3 destination.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
A subdirectory in the Amazon S3 bucket. This subdirectory in Amazon S3 is used to read data from the S3 source location or write data to the S3 destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[\p{L}\p{M}\p{Z}\p{S}\p{N}\p{P}\p{C}]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

S3StorageClass.description: The Amazon S3 storage class you want to store your files in when this location is used as a task destination.
S3StorageClass.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 storage class you want to store your files in when this location is used as a task destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: STANDARD | STANDARD_IA | ONEZONE_IA | INTELLIGENT_TIERING | GLACIER | GLACIER_INSTANT_RETRIEVAL | DEEP_ARCHIVE  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket location.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon S3 bucket location.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the S3 location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the S3 location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw)://[a-zA-Z0-9.\-/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
